instruction: In a bowl, combine yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, red chili powder, coriander powder, garam masala, lemon juice, and salt. Mix well to form a marinade.
title: Prepare Marinade

transcript_segments.text: Hello Foodies, Welcome to Wish My Food. The most awaited recipe is Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biryani. Let's see how to prepare this. If you follow this as it is, you will get the perfect restaurant style biryani taste every time. This is a very tasty biryani. Let's start.
Take 500 grams of chicken. To this, add 1 tsp shahi jeera (caraway seeds), 1 tsp freshly crushed ginger garlic paste, 1/4 cup fried onions, and 1/2 cup chopped coriander.
Now add 1 tbsp red chili powder, 1 tsp cumin powder, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp coriander powder, and salt. Mix everything well. Then add 1/4 cup yogurt and mix thoroughly.
